price: (কোৱাচোন) আপ্যায়নৰ বাবে এইবোৰেই উত্তম নে যাক্কূম গছ উত্তম?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
